Packson Ngugi bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ejije na ihe nkiri, ma pụta na mgbasa ozi TV nke Kenya. Ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi TV, Omo Pick A Box, na ngwụsị afọ 1990.

O mere onye na-elekọta ụlọ ozu na ihe nkiri The Constant Gardener Ọ bụ onye guzobere Za kikwetu Productions ltd, ụlọ ọrụ Casting Agency nke nwekwara Recording Studio maka mgbasa ozi redio na ihe nkiri.

N'etiti afọ 1990, Ngugi sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Joni Nderitu nwụrụ anwụ, Paul Onsongo nakwa Ben Mutua Jonathan Muriithi (BMJ Muriithi), na-eme ngagharị iwe n'okporo ámá Nairobi iji mee ngagharị iwe maka atụmatụ inweta Kenya National Theatre site na Norfolk Hotel dị nso, ihe mere ka gọọmentị Kenya kagbuo mkpebi ya.
